word_mean: 〔NA〕腹膜：衬盖腹腔和盆腔(壁层腹膜)及各内脏(脏层腹膜)的浆膜，为一坚固、表面光滑的无色膜，在男性构成一密闭囊，在女性与输卵管粘膜相连续

sentence.Network_en: The ventral nerve cord is covered externally by a peritoneum.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from Greek peritonaion, from peritonos 'stretched round', from peri- 'around' + -tonos 'stretched'

means.word_mean: 1. a transparent membrane that lines the abdominal cavity in mammals and covers most of the viscera
